video_prompt: Time-lapse of a futuristic cityscape transitioning from dawn to dusk. Flying vehicles zip along glowing elevated highways, their headlights pulsing. Skyscraper illuminations shift and dance across facades. Distant city lights shimmer and fade with atmospheric changes.
image_prompt: Futuristic city at dawn/dusk, warm orange and pink sky. Towering, modern skyscrapers, blue and white illuminated architecture, sharp angles, spires, and a domed building. Elevated highway/transport system with vibrant blue glowing path. Sleek, dark metallic flying cars/hovercraft with orange headlights/exhausts. Dynamic, deep perspective, concept art, c29 watermark.
refined_video_prompt: Light dramatically transitions from dawn to dusk, transforming the vista. Flying vehicle streams constantly weave and zip, their headlamps rhythmically pulsing. Building illuminations dynamically shift and dance across surfaces. Distant lights shimmer and fade, reacting to evolving atmospheric flux.
